comments.body: It's probably worth creating and linking to a github issue about fixing this item
is this test a reliable test of stack safety?
@johnynek I don't believe soâ€”it [looks like](https://github.com/typelevel/cats/blob/master/laws/src/main/scala/cats/laws/FlatMapRecLaws.scala#L14) it just checks for consistency with `flatMap`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@  checkAll("Future[Int]", MonadErrorTests[Future, Throwable].monadError[Int, Int, Int])
  checkAll("Future[Int]", ComonadTests[Future].comonad[Int, Int, Int])
  checkAll("Future", MonadRecTests[Future].monadRec[Int, Int, Int])
}
